Menomonee Falls, Wisconsin: Record Research Inc. p.419. is an American rock, R&B; and soul guitarist, musician, songwriter and producer. He is best known as half of the rock and soul duo, Hall & Oates (with Daryl Hall). ==References== ==Other websites== *Official John Oates website *Official website of Hall & Oates * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American guitarists Category:American singer- songwriters Category:Singers from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Writers from New York City
title: John Oates
